name: 柯明村
objective:
本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一) 儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二) 儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage 
system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water system
and ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,
ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.
schedule:
A. Thermal Energy Storage

1. Introduction to Cool Thermal Storage

2. Fundamental Design Concepts

3. Comparison of Storage Technologies
　　Comparison of Overall systems
　　Chilled water storage
　　Ice Harvesting systems
　　External melt ice-on-coil storage systems
　　Internal melt ice-on-coil storage systems
　　Encapsulated ice
　　Eutectic salt phase-change materials

4. Design Procedures

B*. Recent Technology in Energy Storage and Application
1. Electric energy storage
2. Nanotechnology for Energy Devices
 　　Introduction to Nanotechnology
　　Hydrogen Storage
　　Ultra-Capacitor Applications
　　Advanced Energy Application

C. Presentations and Discussions on Special Topics
scorePolicy:
平時成績：點名未到一次扣 5 分　　
Final Exam. 6/19 (六)　　----- 50%
Presentation　　------------- 20%
